title: Will the Real Chris Farley Please Stand Up?
sub_head: Sharing a name with the late Saturday Night Live comedian prepared one writer for a new world of mixed-up online identities.
body:
I’m the real Chris Farley.
No, I’m not the dead guy from “Saturday Night Live.” I don’t live in “a van down by the river,” the catchphrase from that other Farley’s breakout “SNL” sketch. I’ve never danced shirtless with Patrick Swayze, something the other Farley famously did on “SNL” in 1990 and which helped put him on the comedy map.
